mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.kaoqin_uuid_number as kaoqinUuidNumber ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.kecheng_id as kechengId ,a.kaoqin_time as kaoqinTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete as jiaoshiDelete ,kecheng.kecheng_name as kechengName ,kecheng.kecheng_types as kechengTypes ,kecheng.kecheng_photo as kechengPhoto ,kecheng.kecheng_file as kechengFile ,kecheng.banji_types as banjiTypes ,kecheng.jiaoshi_id as kechengJiaoshiId ,kecheng.kecheng_content as kechengContent
FROM kaoqin a left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id left JOIN kecheng kecheng ON a.kecheng_id = kecheng.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.kaoqin_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoqinUuidNumber},'%')
and ( a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} or kecheng.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} )
and ( a.kecheng_id = #{params.kechengId} )
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoqin_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoqinTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoqin_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoqinTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.jiaoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete >= #{params.jiaoshiDeleteStart}
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete <= #{params.jiaoshiDeleteEnd}
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete = #{params.jiaoshiDelete}
and a.kecheng_id IS NOT NULL
and kecheng.kecheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengName},'%')
and kecheng.kecheng_types = #{params.kechengTypes}
and kecheng.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and kecheng.kecheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(kecheng.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(kecheng.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
